name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle - Bonus DLCｓ
detailed_description:
Bonus DLC available until April 23, 2018! (PST)

- Atelier Lydie & Suelle: Marie & Elie Dress Up Costumes
This pack includes a costume for Lydie based on the outfit of Marie from the very first Atelier title - "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg", and a costume for Suelle based on the outfit of Elie from "Atelier Elie: The Alchemist of Salburg 2." Now the twins can look like true Salburg alchemists!

- Atelier Lydie & Suelle: Selected Item Set
A selection of useful items for adventures in "Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~."

- Atelier Lydie & Suelle: Arranged Battle BGM
Arranged battle BGM tracks for "Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~." The BGM can be changed at the desk in the atelier.

fullgame.name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~

supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720NVIDIA GeForce GTX550Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 3.40GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
